title: Little: What Some Folks Will Do
description:
Flannery O’Connor explains that a country lady remarked, of her short stories, “Them stories just gone and shown you how some folks would do.” And so it goes.
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
